ModMetaData.name: ZeroTech-Trait (Continued) [English]
ModMetaData.author: test
ModMetaData.description: This is just a translation and needs to be loaded after ZeroTech-Trait (Continued). The mod's description lists english as one of the supported languages, but in fact that is not the case, hence this translation. It adds a bunch of negative traits, great for counterbalancing most trait mods adding too many positive traits.
